Hoboken.Paula Cooper Gallery:
The Paula Cooper Gallery is an art gallery in New York City founded in 1968.


== Artists ==
The gallery is primarily known for the Minimalist and Conceptual artists it has represented and whose careers it helped launch. Such artists include: Carl Andre, Jennifer Bartlett, Lynda Benglis, Mark di Suvero, Donald Judd, Sol LeWitt, Sophie Calle, Meg Webster among others.
